alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 6:10PM EDT until July 28 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hampshire County in western Massachusetts... Northwestern Franklin County in western Massachusetts... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 610 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stamford to near Cheshire, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Monroe around 620 PM EDT. Charlemont, Cummington and Rowe around 630 PM EDT. Heath around 635 PM EDT. Plainfield and Hawley around 640 PM EDT. Buckland, Ashfield and Goshen around 645 PM EDT. Conway and Colrain around 650 PM EDT. Shelburne and Leyden around 655 PM EDT. Greenfield around 700 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
